hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) wanted to write to some persian rulers. He was told that they would not read a letter without a seal in the form of a silver ring on which he engraved "Muhammad the Messenger of Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اتِّخَاذِ الْخَاتَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Reported About Using A Ring
